ds_11.text: You need to fill out a DS-11!

ds_82.text: You need to fill out a DS-82!

apply_citizen.text: Unfortunately, US citizenship or being a US non-citizen national is a requirement of obtaining a US passport. If you're interested in becoming a US citizen, you can check out the process and requirements at the US Citizenship and Immigration Services website:

no_change.text: Thanks for checking us out! Unfortunately, this app is specifically for updating gender markers for transgender individuals. This link will take you through the State Department passport application wizard. It can help you with name changes, correcting errors, and simple applications.
